net.bytebuddy.implementation.bytecode.member

类 MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler.ForBridgeTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.implementation.bytecode.member.MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler.ForBridgeTarget
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler
    封闭接口:
    MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler

    public static class MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler.ForBridgeTarget
extends Object
implements MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler
    A type casting handler that casts all parameters of a method to the parameter types of a compatible method with covariant parameter types. This allows a convenient implementation of bridge methods.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 net.bytebuddy.implementation.bytecode.member.MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler

      • ofIndex

        public StackManipulation ofIndex(TypeDescription parameterType,
                                 int index)
        从接口复制的说明: MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler
        Yields a stack transformation to transform the given argument of the method for which the arguments are loaded onto the operand stack.
        指定者:
        ofIndex 在接口中 MethodVariableAccess.MethodLoading.TypeCastingHandler
        参数:
        parameterType - The parameter type that is to be transformed.
        index - The index of the transformed parameter.
        返回:
        A transformation to apply after loading the parameter onto the operand stack.
